title: Lifesaving
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Artificial respiration
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drowning - Prevention
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Life-saving
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Rescue work
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Search and rescue operations
description: This film, which includes a demonstration of land drill by the Southsea Police Lifeguard Corps (England), shows in detail the various methods needed for rescuing a docile person, a turbulent person, somebody really violent, and a tired but clear-headed swimmer. The sidestroke method of rescue, the surface dive necessary if the subject has sunk, and the use of artificial respiration are also demonstrated.
